titles.title: O, Will You Dance On This Side Of The Sea?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Will you dance on this side of the sea?
Will you dance before your eyes can see?
Before your eyes can see, before the victory?
Will you dance on this side of the sea?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yes, I'll dance on this side of the sea,
Yes, I'll dance before my eyes can see,
Before my eyes can see, before the victory,
Yes, I'll dance on this side of the sea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If you'll dance on this side of the sea,
If you'll dance before your eyes can see,
You'll find new faith in who I am,
I'll be the God who really can,
Then you'll dance on both sides of the sea.
